sysevent_in_email_action.name: Update Patient Contact
sysevent_in_email_action.reply_email:
(function runInboundEmailAction() {
    var emailBody = email.body_text;

    
    var patientIdMatch = emailBody.match(/Patient ID:\s*(PAT\d+)/i);
    var contactNumberMatch = emailBody.match(/New Contact Number:\s*(\d+)/i);
    var emailMatch = emailBody.match(/New Email:\s*([^\s]+)/i); 

    
    if (!patientIdMatch || !contactNumberMatch || !emailMatch) {
        gs.print("Inbound Email Action: Missing required data in email body.");
        return;
    }

    var patientId = patientIdMatch[1];
    var newContactNumber = contactNumberMatch[1];
    var newEmail = emailMatch[1];

    // Fetch patient record
    var patientGR = new GlideRecord('u_patient');
    if (patientGR.get('number', patientId)) {
        patientGR.contact_number = u_contact_number;
        patientGR.email = u_email;
        patientGR.update();
        gs.print("Inbound Email Action: Patient record updated successfully for Patient ID: " + patientId);
    } else {
        gs.print("Inbound Email Action: No patient found with ID: " + patientId);
    }
})();
